byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS, TOM PEDULLA and KEN BELSON

abstract: NFL Roundup; defensive end Ray McDonald, on heels of being cut by Chicago Bears, is arrested for violating restraining order issued by his ex-fiancee; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: McDonald, accused of breaking down a bedroom door to get to his ex-fiancée and their infant on Monday, violated a restraining order by being at a residence on Wednesday, the police said.

headline.main: Ray McDonald, Cut by the Bears on Monday, Is Arrested Again
headline.print_headline: McDonald, Cut by the Bears on Monday, Is Arrested Again

snippet: McDonald, accused of breaking down a bedroom door to get to his ex-fiancée and their infant on Monday, violated a restraining order by being at a residence on Wednesday, the police said.
